response.overview: Based on the memoir of Mitch Martow, "Bend or Break" is a character driven documentary centered on the inspiring story of Mitch Martow's life. The story begins with a 14 year old boy's struggle with sudden chronic pains and takes us on a journey of multiple misdiagnosis to finally understanding the actual disease (Hyper-mobility EDS - Ehlers Danlos Syndrome).
response.title: Bend or Break
